GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
riscv:uprobe fix SR_SPIE set/clear handling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit c71e000db8536d27ec410abb3e314896a78b4f19, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 74784081aac8a0f3636965fc230e2d3b7cc123c6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
riscv:uprobe fix SR_SPIE set/clear handling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit c71e000db8536d27ec410abb3e314896a78b4f19, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 74784081aac8a0f3636965fc230e2d3b7cc123c6. For more details please see the references link.
